Simple, Transparent Pricing

Voice AI solutions designed for inbound customer service and outbound campaigns. Built on SeaChat Premium ($29.99) and SeaX Omni-channel ($99) foundations.

Perfect for Customer Service

Inbound Only

$29.99 /month

Ideal for businesses needing an inbound call solution with Voice AI (based on SeaChat Premium plan)

  • AI-based call handling (inbound calls only)
  • Voice AI starts at $0.12 per minute (ChatGPT-4o mini model)
  • Phone number included ($2-$3/month with E911 address)
  • Call recording and summary
  • Transfer to human agent support
  • Multi-language voice support
  • 10+ Speech-To-Text languages
  • 10+ Text-To-Speech languages with voices from Azure, ElevenLabs, OpenAI
  • CRM integrations (Salesforce, HubSpot)
  • Calendar integration (Google, Outlook)
  • Call analytics and reporting
  • Email notifications for calls
  • No outbound calling capabilities
  • No bulk campaign features

How SeaVoice Connects with SeaChat & SeaX

🔗 SeaChat Integration

SeaVoice Inbound Only ($29.99/month) is built on SeaChat Premium plan foundations, providing voice AI capabilities for incoming calls at $0.12 per minute.

Perfect for businesses wanting to add voice AI to their existing SeaChat setup.

📞 SeaX Integration

SeaVoice Inbound + Outbound ($99/month) mirrors SeaX Omni-channel pricing, enabling large-scale voice campaigns with callback handling.

Ideal for businesses running outbound campaigns who need comprehensive voice AI coverage.

✨ The Complete Picture

All Voice AI calls across SeaChat, SeaX, and SeaVoice use the same $0.12 per minute rate with ChatGPT-4o mini model. When contacts call back after outbound campaigns, SeaVoice seamlessly handles these inbound calls with the same AI intelligence.
